front.title: Interface Stack Table Definition and Example for Point to Point (P2P) Interface over LAN

abstract.t: [RFC5309] defines the P2P circuit type is one of the mainly used circuit types in the link state routing protocol, and highlights it is important to identify the correct circuit type when forming adjacencies, flooding link state database packets, and monitoring the link state. The P2P interface over LAN ifType value is assigned by IANA experts review. This document provides advice to the ifStack for the P2P interface over LAN ifType to facilitate operational control, maintenance and statistics.
